00017 class TextFile : public File {
00018 public:
00019     void setDelimiter(char delim);
00020

00064 template <typename T> TextFile& TextFile::operator<<(const T &rhs) {
00065     _internal << rhs;
00066     if (!_internal.good()) {
00067         Warn("Error writing data to %c:" << rhs);
00068     }
00069 
00070     return (*this);
00071 }
00072 
00073 template <typename T> TextFile& TextFile::operator>>(T &rhs) {
00074     Warn("Can't read in this data type.");
00075     return (*this);
00076 }
